version_description:
In-game purchases are no possible
Fixed some visual artifacts
Improved controls and user interface

Fixed in-game purchases with mobile internet connections
Fixed saving when minimizing the app
Fixed occasional keyboard that can't be hidden
Recover old savegames stored with version 1.0.1 (potentially got lost in 1.0.2 if cloud sync was not used)

Improved steering and added option to change sensitivity
Added option to change time scale
Added option to disable traffic
Added option to disable helpers buying seeds/fertilizer
Various saving improvements (cloud save still requires an unmetered connection though)
Various UI improvements
Various bug fixes
Performance improvements

Added CLAAS Jaguar 960TT forage harvester with Direct Disc 500, Orbis 900 and Pick Up 300 tools
Added CLAAS Xerion 5000 tractor
Several gameplay fixes

Added John Deere 9620 RX tractor
Added John Deere S790 combine with 645FD and 618C headers
Added Fliegl semitrailer
Several gameplay fixes

Added Claas Quadrant 5300 baler
Added Claas Axion 570 tractor
Several gameplay fixes
Fixed rare crash when loading a game

Added John Deere CP690 Cotton Harvester
Added McCormick Cotton Tag Trailer
Added option to sell and buy animals without a trailer
Various bug fixes and improvements

Added Bourgault FMS CD872-8 seeder
Added Bourgault SPS360-50 cultivator
Various bug fixes and improvements
